rows.label: qev015001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Say, you're [ST:playername ], right? Nice!
My name's Dirk, and I'm out here on an
assignment for the Harriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just talking with the guys back at base about the
crazy new rookie working with Elma. I was hoping
we'd get a chance to talk someday![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0003
rows.name:
You guys have been cutting through the Ganglion like a
hot knife through butter. What's the secret? You cook
up genius plans before heading into battle or what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0011
rows.name: Boast about the wide range of clever tactics you use.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0020
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Dirk that brute force is the only way to go.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'd love to hear your stories sometime. I'm a sniper
myself, so sneaky is pretty much my whole game.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0005
rows.name:
Against the things crawling around on Mira? Yeesh!
How much brute force does it take to pull THAT off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0006
rows.name: Hey, so are you free right now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0007
rows.name:
Me and the rest of Team Jaeger are supposed to hunt
down critters in Sylvalum for materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0008
rows.name:
If you aren't doing anything else, maybe you'd like
to come along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0009
rows.name:
I just really want to watch you work.
Would that be okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Aw, nice! I'll be honest, this is my first time here,
and I was feeling pretty nervous until now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0011
rows.name:
Er, you don't mind, do you, Adelbert?
The list of materials we're after is pretty long this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0012
rows.name: Fine by me. I'll take any help I can get.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0014
rows.name:
This area's teeming with dangerous indigens,
and there are Ganglion forces around to boot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0015
rows.name:
Frankly, I was worried about getting my work done
while having to babysit the rookie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0016
rows.name: Hey! I've seen a few battles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0017
rows.name:
Bah! I'll show them! This hunt is my chance to prove to
Phina and Grette how far I've come![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0030
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Dirk to take it slow and careful.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0040
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Dirk it'll be a piece of cake.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0018
rows.name: Aw, not you too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0019
rows.name:
Fine then. I'll just have to bag a big one and PROVE
that I'm no rookie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0020
rows.name: Thanks! I'm sure we'll bag a big one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0021
rows.name:
I look forward to that when—and if—it happens, Rook.
Now let's get this hunt started![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0022
rows.name: Phina! Grette! I need a favor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0023
rows.name:
We'll start the hunt here. But I need you to head to the
base and gather information on the materials we're
looking for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0024
rows.name:
You think you can give me orders?
And boring orders, no less?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0025
rows.name:
Whoa, easy! Backup's still an important role!
...And besides, there's half an ice-cream cake left in
the freezer. We can eat it when we go back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ice-cream cake? ...Yeah, all right. I'm sold.
But you owe Phina for this one, Adelbert![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'll keep that in mind. ...All right, let's secure the area.
Hunt down any intara monoceroses you find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0028
rows.name:
How about a little race, [ST:playername ]?
If what I've heard about you is true,
you should have no trouble beating me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0051
rows.name: Take Adelbert's challenge.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0060
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Adelbert to take his work more seriously.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0029
rows.name: Hah! I like your style![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0030
rows.name:
All right, I'm ready to do some damage!
Let the games begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0031
rows.name: Huh? Y-yeah, that's true, but this is just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ha ha! Adelbert's always the one cracking the whip,
but right now he looks like a kid with his hand caught
in the cookie jar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0033
rows.name:
We'll see who's in trouble later, Rook!
...Now, enough talk. Let's hunt![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0034
rows.name:
Stay on your toes, everyone! We're the only humans
out here, and I don't want any accidents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0035
rows.name: Phina and Grette are back in the tent gathering info.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0036
rows.name:
Our job is to secure the area by clearing out all the
intara monoceroses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0039
rows.name: Hmm? Did I just...hear something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0070
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Dirk it was nothing.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0080
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Dirk to stay alert.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0040
rows.name: Phew! If you say so, I'm sure it's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0041
rows.name:
Heh, I guess hunting in unfamiliar territory still has me
a bit spooked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0042
rows.name:
It's weird. It wasn't like I heard it so much as...
I don't know. Felt it, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0043
rows.name: We'd better stay ready for anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0044
rows.name: Adelbert... Oh no... What am I supposed to do?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Oh! It's you! I'm sorry! I'm sorry—what should I do?!
If I don't do something, they'll kill them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0090
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Dirk what happened.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0100
rows.name: Calm

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0101
rows.name: Tell Dirk to calm down.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0046
rows.name: R-right. Sorry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0047
rows.name: Calm...? R-right. Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0048
rows.name: Adelbert got back, so we were eating dinner here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0049
rows.name: Then a whole army of those Prone guys came and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0050
rows.name: And they...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0051
rows.name:
They killed him! They killed Adelbert! He was trying to
shield Grette. He rushed them, but they...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0052
rows.name:
Then they stuffed Grette and Phina into sacks and took
them away! They fought like hell, but it didn't matter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0053
rows.name: Please, you have to save them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0054
rows.name:
They were headed to the northwest.
There's a cave there—that's got to be their hideout.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0055
rows.name:
I just... I hid in the tent. I watched Adelbert die.
...Watched the Prone capture the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0056
rows.name:
I just...watched. It was all so overwhelming.
My body wouldn't move.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0057
rows.name: Please. Help Grette and Phina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0058
rows.name:
The Prone who attacked us headed to the northwest.
There's a cave there—that's got to be their hideout.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0059
rows.name: ...Phina told me everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0060
rows.name:
What happened to Grette was...
I still can't even process it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0061
rows.name: But even just Phina surviving is a miracle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0062
rows.name:
That never could have happened if not for you.
So thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0110
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask where Phina is now.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0120
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0121
rows.name: Express regret for not saving Grette.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0063
rows.name:
In the tent, asleep. She had to turn off feedback from
her nerve circuits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0064
rows.name:
The slightest noise had her shaking and screaming.
She kept saying "The Prone! The Prone!" over and over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0065
rows.name: Not that I can blame her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0066
rows.name: She saw Grette's... She saw everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0067
rows.name:
Phina kept bawling apologies to Grette until she finally
cried herself to sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0068
rows.name:
The only one who should be apologizing is me.
I was a coward who stood by and did nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0069
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0070
rows.name: I'll take Phina and head back to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0071
rows.name: I'm not leaving her side until she recovers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0072
rows.name: No matter how long it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0073
rows.name:
It's the only way I can atone for letting my fear stop
me from helping Adelbert and Grette.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0130
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0131
rows.name: Nod and say that's what they would want.

rows.label: qev015001_JNK0140
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev015001_SEL0141
rows.name: Chastise him for using Phina to alleviate his own guilt.

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0074
rows.name:
You're like a saint. I hope I can find that kind of mercy
and love in myself. Phina is going to need it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0075
rows.name:
...You're right. So I'll just have to make sure I'm helping
her for the right reasons. She deserves that much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0076
rows.name:
We may never work as BLADEs again,
but I hope you'll continue to grow strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015001_MSG0077
rows.name:
Here. I know it isn't much, but maybe it will be enough
to help you save someone else.[ST:wait ]
